short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step into the world of Demon Slayer with this immersive new tab theme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Featuring stunning artwork from the popular anime, the background captures the intense and captivating spirit of the Demon Slayer universe. Whether you're a fan of Tanjiro, Nezuko, or any of the fierce Hashira, this new tab theme offers a visually striking experience every time you open your browser. With a sleek design and a dynamic interface, it not only enhances your screen but also includes real-time updates and a branding logo on the popup, providing a unique and customized browsing experience for any anime fan.
